titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Clark S. Marlor Brooklyn collection ARC.268
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-25 13:51:40 +0000.

did.unittitle: Clark S. Marlor Brooklyn collection (tentative record)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Clark S. Marlor Brooklyn collection contains...

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Jerome Frank photographs of Prospect Park, Brooklyn Heights, and Fort Greene, V1990.062, Box number, Object ID number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Reproduction rights for the photographs have not been evaluated. For information on securing rights to publish or reproduce, please see the Brooklyn Historical Society Reproduction Rights Policy.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Item level description and digital versions of images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library. Please consult library staff for more information.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Clark S. Marlor Brooklyn collection, ARC.268, Box and Folder number, Object ID number (if applicable); Brooklyn Historical Society.
